description: Click-to-call allows you to create URLs that can be POSTed to with a phone number or SIP URI and create a phone call from the provided contact information to a destination you have pre-determined.

name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the click to call

extension.name: Extension Number
extension.description: The extension to connect to when the click to call is invoked

auth_required.name: Is Auth Required?
auth_required.description: Determines if this click to call requires valid auth-tokens when invoked

whitelist.name: Allowed Numbers
whitelist.description: A list of regular expressions that the click to call can dial to

throttle.name: Rate Limit
throttle.description: The rate that this click to call can be invoked
